[h1] I won't be crying and ranting, because you have already heard that thousand of times, but I'll say this: [/h1]

[b] When you decide to donate for a skin, remember that you donate to: [/b]
[u]-Scammers (They cancelled PVE half year before OW2 release not telling to anyone) [/u]
[u]-Also they have removed OW1 technically stealing your money for it [/u]
[u]-Actual female molesters [/u]
[u]-An employee was stealing woman's milk from fridge, and then bragging about it [/u]
[u]-Because of molest, a woman commited suicide [/u]
[u]-Because of them, an Overwatch League is about to fall [/u]
[u]-Disqualifiers of their players, for their political views [/u]


[b] What you get in return: [/b]
[u] -Your skin [/u]
[u] -They will keep enforcing predatory donation system [/u]
[u] -They will keep doing battlepasses [/u]
[u] -They will keep things and heroes behind paywalls (dude, they're selling voice lines) [/u]
[u] -They are not as interested in balance, so they won't really fix it [/u]
[u] -They will keep making 3/5★ characters with lame voice acting and Paladins style design [/u]
[u] -Absolute disrespect [/u]

[b] I believe for any changes - the game needs to die, either for good changes or bad. Right now it's too horrible to play and enjoy... might as well die faster [/b]

[i] I fell in love with this game so long ago... they have murdered it

tldr: Devs fucked up a brilliant game. If you're here for a hyper competitive team shooter play CS:GO, Valorant, or Siege. If you're here for a hero shooter play Valorant, Apex Legends, Team Fortress 2, or Paladins. They will all give you a better experience.

The devs have no idea what they're doing. For example, the balancing team is actually on crack. Almost every season, one of the characters gets gigabuffed into oblivion, instantly becoming the best by far, and another character gets nerfed into the ground, instantly becoming the worst by far. They actually manage to make everyone feel horrible except for the people who play the few characters that got buffed. I don't think OW2 has felt balanced for a single second I've played it.

That's not even getting into the extremely toxic community, scummy monetization practices, the fact that the game got abandoned for a few years for no reason, the broken promises regarding PvE, or the fact that the developers fucking molest people. Everything about this game's developers is just bad.

What makes me the most sad out of all of this is how good the core gameplay of Overwatch is. It feels super smooth, all of the heroes are unique and interesting (excluding Lifeweaver), the art is some of the best, and it has a great system for creating gamemodes called the Workshop.

Even with all of these great bonuses, the developers betrayed the community with this game. At this point, it's just another toxic team shooter, and unfortunately the least fun one due to the community and developers. On another note, make sure to buy the battle pass so you can play this brand new character with no unique ideas in their kit hahahahaha fuck this

Pwease don't pick on this small Indie developer guys they only destroyed their own game, sexually harassed and assaulted female employees, locked all their new heroes behind a shitty battlepass, failed to deliver content for years, deceived paying customers and loyal fans with a "sequel", burned what little goodwill they had left by scrapping the one mode that people might have played, scrapped a failing e-sports scene and spent years consistently struggled to deal with stale metas, balance updates, bugs, cheaters and server issues across the board.

It's just not fair they're just a small indie developer guys, pwease be nice.

This is the worst game that I have ever played. I already knew going into it I would have no fun but when I got in oh boy was I right. They made me play a tutorial that I had to do which took forever. The only reason someone would need a tutorial for a game like that shouldn't be playing games. Then I got into the game. The moment I loaded into it I was hit with a wave of boredom. I had only one mode to pick from and not many characters to choose which felt very limiting. It was very hard to have fun since it took forever to kill someone and it was slow to get around the map. This game does not feel complete and is a very limiting experience which causes me to give it a low rating even with not much play time.

the point is,

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评

评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

新玩家的避坑理由
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。
